TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
That's the person who cooks your dispensers. May he rest in pieces.

Waiter! There's hype in my soup!

Well, .25 is so close to release, Rimworld Alpha 7 just came out, Alaska's $1800 dividend came in the mail, I'm getting a better Windows version, and Fallout Equestria: The Game is making good progress. There should be hype in that soup.

Waiter, TL;DR, there's a steak!

No, General, you ARE a steak!

Waiter, there's a purple thing in my soup!

well i hope so, its eggplant

waiter, there is a facehugger in my soup!

We will all witness the birth of the ultimate being!

Waiter, there's an EMPIRE ATÃ¢â‚¬â€¹ WAR in my soup.

Woah, it's decimating the soup! I think this is the perfect time to remind you that there are no refunds on soup.

Waiter! Soup there's speakerphone picture frame!

Wat...

Waiter, EA Games has made it a micro-transaction to get flavor in my soup!

Customer support not available.

Waiter, there's a xenonaut in my soup!

Oh right, let me fix that with MISTER FLAMETHROWARRRR *WHOOOOSHHH*

waiter, you are in my soup, and i got no problem with canibalism

Oh, but you still don't want to eat me? I'll stay here.

Waiter, my soup is throwing around with nuclear waste.

that is you sir.

wqiater my soup is having more soup come out of it but its a dfirrent kind

It's a hellgate! Destroy it!!!!

Waiter, their is a hype train that has '.25' painted on it in my soup!

No silly, it's just the toxic fumes from the soup, that make you hallucinate.

Waiter, there's a bunch of bologna in my soup. >:-[

You ordered that.

Waiter, there's a worm hole in my soup.

Edited October 7, 2014 by LABHOUSE

Ah, that. That costs extra.

Waiter, there may or may not be a dead cat in my soup!

You ordered the Quantumsoup, sir.

Waiter, my soup is purple, thick, and planes are trying to fly through it.

You clearly ordered the Eve atmosphere soup, sir. Now hurry up and eat it before those planes figure out how to fuel their turbojets to burn in an iodine environment!

Waiter! There's a Halloween department store section in my soup!

What? no! let me check... It's only a youth fashion department store. See? everything's alright.

Waiter, there's a grinning galaxy in my soup. >:-[

Delicious! But if you prefer a angry galaxy, you should hit it in his face with your spoon. Spoon is unlocked once you've bought the premium version of this soup.

Waiter, there is a destroyed KSC in my soup.

The chef must of dropped an asteroid on it.

Waiter, there is rocket fuel in my soup!

Well, if you drink it, you're hired!

Waiter, a SSME is my soup bowl. Can I buy it?

Ok.

Waiter, there's a Hitler in my soup!

He mistook your bowl for a bunker.

Waiter, there's a piano in my soup!
Well, yes. Isn't that what you ordered? Piano soup? I can substitute a clavichord if you'd like.

Wait, why'd you call me over if you have nothing to say?

Waiter! There's a garage door opener in my soup!
